Service Details: - Provide beds, some of which are in foster homes, to children and youth in need, referred by MCFD- These are short-term placements for children/youth in care where the Ministry of Children and Family Development conducts a practical assessment for use in the provision of future care
Former Name: Central Okanagan Boys and Girls Club
